title: Heroes A2Z #10: Joey Down Under
description: This Joey is No Kangaroo.He's a Bossy Aussie From Down Under.Traverse City, Michigan is home to three extra ordinary heroes. Meet Abigail, the oldest. When it comes to sports, she can't be beat. Abigail is her twin. If it has wheels, he can ride it. Baby Zoe is the youngest but also the strongest. Don't let the diaper fool you.In this adventure, the Land Down Under comes to Mackinac Island. Welcome to Australian Days! Meet kangaroos, koalas, and a kid named Joey who puts the boom in boomerang.
author: David Anthony
